content: आह्वानं {@--1@} Calling, inviting. {@--2@} A call, invitation, summons (in general); सुहृदाह्वानं प्रकुवर्ति <ls>Pt. 3. 47.</ls> {@--3@} A legal summons (from court or govt. to appear before a tribunal); <ls>Mk. 9.</ls> {@--4@} Invocation of a deity; <ls>Ms. 9. 126.</ls> {@--5@} A challenge. {@--6@} A name, appellation. {@--7@} <ab>N.</ab> of a liturgical formula.
